fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Pound Key- (Night) Astrally target a player. The ability they used tonight will be disconnected the next night, making them unable to use it.
Healing Bell!- (Day) [Cheat] Target a Cog and give them a single use Powerful autovest. While they have this autovest, they become Overcharged, making their factional attack one tier higher. You cannot target an Overcharged Cog with this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You cannot Pound Key the same player two nights in a row.
-If a non-Cog player somehow becomes the target of Healing Bell!, they will receive the autovest, but not any Overcharge effect.
